English.Text: The splendid warriors are all women. Exploring this deserted settlement, which appears to have been the scene of a revolt, seemed a good opportunity for some looting, but your crew aren't the only ones to have had the idea. As they pass the barricades of barrels, tables and chairs, they happen upon a group of warriors, not a man among them. Indeed, the long-trousered women assume a defensive formation so fluently, it's possible they are more than human.
